entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] REGNUM_AMBIENT_SP not properly handled in debugging information #77089
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.WorkItemExecution failing with Internal CLR error on Win x86 #77087
  • [API Proposal]: ICopyable<T> #77077
  • [mono] Investigate raising interpreter inlining threshold #77073
  • Support loop cloning of class member arrays #77071
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT RC2 crash with GVMs on linux-x64 #77070
    7.0.x

Closed

  • VS Code failed to run .NET runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 on WSL2 #77048
  • [API Proposal]: Pattern matching with Span<char>/ ReadOnlySpan<char> with specified casing and culture #76441
    Future
  • `TypeLoadException`: Struct used as a generic argument for a value type #77074
  • Blazor WASM crashes after a time with Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/../sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:91 558006 @ dotnet.6.0.0.csqdfrwtlv.js:1 #62054
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused extension #77088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Generate CodeView debug information for .asm files #77084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add "_generated.*" suffix to some auto-generated files #77083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: avoid LCL_FLD stress for locals that already have LCL_FLD appear… #77082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Consecutive registers #77072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Cleanup file descriptions baked into Windows unmanaged .dlls #77080
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update comment #77075
    community-contribution
  • Updated NugetProjectModelVersion from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2. #77057
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixed a typo in a variable name #77062
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix loading app-local ICU #77065
    area-System.Globalization
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [WIP] statically linking GC PAL #76985
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Emit ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished for dynamic modules #77068
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Modify __int64 definition in PAL to match the OS definition #77056
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
